Cygwin and Jekyll

Date: 2014-07-06 00:00:00 +0000

Installing Cygwin + Jekyll in Windows 8.1 Just a quick one from me today, I recently got a awesome new laptop, that sadly does not seem to want to dual boot with Fedora, so I have been forced to fall back to just a Windows 8 Machine. A work colleague suggested I give Cygwin a whirl to continue to use all the amazing things Windows just cant do. During the set-up I got extremely annoyed with the GUI based normal way of installing the environment due to me managing to break ruby + gems and it taking longer than necessary...
